filename: Mr Fly and Mr Big Head .pdf
content:
Mr Fly and Mr Big
 Head 
 
 Dorothy Fetaru
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is Mr Fly. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is Mr Big Head. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mr Big Head and Mr Fly 
 
 were friends. 
 
 
 
 One day, they went for a 
 
 walk together. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 They came to the edge of a 
 
 river, and started arguing 
 
 with each other. 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mr Fly said, “You can’t jump 
 
 over this river!” 
 
 
 
 “Yes, I can! It’s you who 
 
 
 can’t!” replied Mr Big Head. 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “You jump!” said Mr Fly. 
 
 “No, you jump first,” said Mr 
 
 Big Head. 
 
 So Mr Fly flew acros the 
 
 river. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Then Mr Big Head jumped 
 
 into the river. 
 
 
 
 But his head was so big 
 
 that he started to sink. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mr Fly laughed, “He he!” 
 
 
 
 But he laughed so much 
 
 that his mouth tore in two 
 
 from one side to the other! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7
